title: unturned steam地址与注册方法
author: a184761935
txt_content: steam:http://store.steampowered.com/app/304930/   注册：http://store.steampowered.com/   找到社区活动 点加入steam 然后自行查看 然后下载steam客户端 然后 http://store.steampowered.com/app/304930/ 点击下载
